name: PHVS_CaseProbableReason_COVID-19
title: Case Probable Reason (COVID-19)
description: Rationale for classifying a case as probable

concept.display: Meets clinical criteria AND epidemiologic evidence with no confirmatory lab testing performed for COVID-19
Meets presumptive lab evidence AND either clinical criteria OR epidemiologic evidence
Meets vital records criteria with no confirmatory lab testing
